item.description:
Hooray for summer!!! It's an authentic Island Luau and BBQ. Join us for a fun-filled afternoon of music and entertainment. 

There will be drink specials and an authentic island BBQ buffet. Choose from BBQ chicken, pulled pork, BBQ ribs, JD BBQ hanger steak, tuna and more.  Chef Sean serves it as you like it from 12-4:00pm. 

Also, there will be scenic narrated boat rides around beautiful Lake Pocopotaug available for $10.00 per person. Boat rides are one half hour in duration. Boats depart at 12, 1, 2, 3, and 4pm. Just make a reservation with the hostess when you arrive.

So come out and join us if you are looking for something to do!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Look, or ask, for Terri....Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Angelico's Lake House BBQ Grill Luau...
